abstracts.cdata!:
The Development Learning Center Project
            for Malawi was considered a risk for the whole portfolio
            that could affect negatively future prospects of increasing
            IDA resources for Malawi. In parallel, the new Government of
            Malawi has been developing a new strategy and reconsidering
            its areas of focus (now in areas of growth and
            infrastructure). The Government of Malawi officially
            requested the cancellation of the IDA credit early November
            2005, since the project no longer falls within the
            government's current strategic priorities.
